data.title: The Movies That Made Me
data.meta_description: The King of Troma, Lloyd Kaufman, joins us to discuss some of the more savory movies that made him.
data.text:
Season 02 | Episode 35

Lloyd Kaufman

Director / Producer

King of Troma Lloyd Kaufman joins us to discuss some of the more savory movies that made him.
